hello world

29 Dec 2016

introducing smashism.github.io

Howdy, I’ve set up this space to post updates when I add or update one of my scripts. You can see my main Git account here.

Flex theme

I’m using the Flex theme. Flex is open sourced on GitHub and is licensed under the MIT License. Feel free to contribute to it anytime!
